00048 /*****************************************************************************\
00049  *
00050  *  File: mia_shladd.c
00051  *
00052  *  Description:
00053  *      Convert a shladd with R0 and an add to a shladd instruction.
00054  *
00055  *  Authors:
00056  *
00057 \*****************************************************************************/
00058 /* 09/17/02 REK Updating file to use function from libtahoeop instead of
00059  *              Tmdes. */
00060 
00061 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00062 #include <config.h>
00063 #include "mia_internal.h"
00064 
00065 #undef DEBUG_SHLADD_MERGE
00066 #undef DEBUG_SHLADDP4
00067 
00068 /* function prototypes */
00069 static int M_local_shift_add_merge (L_Cb * cb);
00070 static int M_global_shift_add_merge (L_Cb * cbA, L_Cb * cbB);
00071 
00072 /* dataflow with reaching_defs must have been done */
00073 
00074 static int
00075 M_does_operand_contain_label_addr (L_Oper * oper,
00076                                    L_Operand * operand, int *reaching_df_done)
00077 {
00078   L_Oper *def_oper;
00079   Set def_set;
00080   int num_defs, *def_buf;
00081   int i, value = FALSE;
00082 
00083   if (!L_is_macro (operand))
00084     {
00085       def_set = L_get_reaching_defs (operand, oper, reaching_df_done);
00086 
00087       if (def_set)
00088         {
00089           value = TRUE;
00090           num_defs = Set_size (def_set);
00091           def_buf = (int *) Lcode_malloc (sizeof (int) * (num_defs + 1));
00092           (void) Set_2array (def_set, def_buf);
00093 
00094           for (i = 0; i < num_defs; i++)
00095             {
00096               def_oper = L_oper_hash_tbl_find_oper (L_fn->oper_hash_tbl,
00097                                                     def_buf[i]);
00098               if (def_oper->proc_opc != TAHOEop_MOVL)
00099                 {
00100                   value = FALSE;
00101                   break;
00102                 }               /* if */
00103             }                   /* for i */
00104           Lcode_free (def_buf);
00105         }                       /* if */
00106     }                           /* if */
00107   return (value);
00108 }                               /* M_does_operand_contain_label_addr */

00111 /****************************************************************************
00112  *
00113  * routine: M_local_shladdp4
00114  * purpose: compbine sxt and shladd into shladdp4
00115  * input: cb - block to process
00116  * output:
00117  * returns:  number of changes
00118  * modified: Created JEP 1/98
00119  *           
00120  * note:  Changes
00121  
00122              sxt      r1 = r2
00123              shladd   r3 = r1,n,rb
00124 
00125      into 
00126 
00127              sxt      r1 = r2
00128              shladdp4 r3 = r2,n,rb
00129 
00130 No opers are removed.  The proc_opc is changed from shladd to shladdp4.
00131 Some attempt is made to make sure that rb is a base register and the
00132 upper bits can be swizzled.  
00133 
00134  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00135 
00136 #if 0
00137 
00138 int
00139 M_local_shladdp4 (L_Cb * cb, int *reaching_df_done)
00140 {
00141   int change = 0;
00142   L_Oper *opA, *opB;
00143 
00144   /*   fprintf(stderr, "***********   In cb %d *************\n", cb->id); */
00145 
00146   for (opA = cb->first_op; opA; opA = opA->next_op)
00147     {
00148       if (opA->proc_opc != TAHOEop_SXT4)
00149         continue;
00150 
00151       for (opB = opA->next_op; opB; opB = opB->next_op)
00152         {
00153           int macro_flag;
00154 
00155           if (!(opB->proc_opc == TAHOEop_SHLADD))
00156             continue;
00157 
00158           if (!L_same_operand (opA->dest[0], opB->src[0]))
00159             continue;
00160 
00161           /* Conservatively, need to make sure that base is positive
00162              and swizzleable */
00163 
00164           if (!M_does_operand_contain_label_addr (opB, opB->src[2],
00165                                                   reaching_df_done))
00166             continue;
00167 
00168           if (!PG_superset_predicate_ops (opA, opB))
00169             continue;
00170 
00171           if (!L_no_defs_between (opA->dest[0], opA, opB))
00172             break;
00173 
00174           if (!L_same_def_reachs (opA->src[0], opA, opB))
00175             continue;
00176 
00177           macro_flag = (L_is_fragile_macro (opA->dest[0]) ||
00178                         L_is_fragile_macro (opA->src[0]));
00179 
00180           if (!L_no_danger
00181               (macro_flag, 0 /*load_flag */ , 0 /* store_flag */ ,
00182                opA, opB))
00183             break;
00184 
00185           /* 
00186            *  Replace Pattern
00187            */
00188 
00189 #ifdef DEBUG_SHLADDP4
00190           fprintf (stderr, "Local shladdp4: op%d -> op%d, (cb %d)\n",
00191                    opA->id, opB->id, cb->id);
00192 #endif
00193 
00194           opB->proc_opc = TAHOEop_SHLADDP4;
00195           L_delete_operand (opB->src[0]);
00196           opB->src[0] = L_copy_operand (opA->src[0]);
00197           change += 1;
00198         }                       /* for opB */
00199     }                           /* for opA */
00200   return change;
00201 }                               /* M_local_shladdp4 */

00203 #endif
00204 
00205 void
00206 Mopti_shladd (L_Func * fn)
00207 {
00208   L_Cb *cb1;
00209   L_Cb *cb2;
00210 
00211   L_alloc_danger_ext = L_create_alloc_pool ("L_Danger_Ext",
00212                                             sizeof (struct L_Danger_Ext), 64);
00213 
00214   MOD ("Flow analysis DOM AD AE LV due to shladd");
00215   L_do_flow_analysis (fn, DOMINATOR_CB | AVAILABLE_DEFINITION |
00216                       AVAILABLE_EXPRESSION | LIVE_VARIABLE);
00217 
00218   for (cb1 = fn->first_cb; cb1 != NULL; cb1 = cb1->next_cb)
00219     while (M_local_shift_add_merge (cb1));
00220 
00221   L_compute_danger_info (fn);
00222   MOD ("Flow analysis DOM AD AE LV due to shladd");
00223   L_do_flow_analysis (fn, DOMINATOR_CB | AVAILABLE_DEFINITION |
00224                       AVAILABLE_EXPRESSION | LIVE_VARIABLE);
00225 
00226   for (cb1 = fn->first_cb; cb1 != NULL; cb1 = cb1->next_cb)
00227     {
00228       for (cb2 = fn->first_cb; cb2 != NULL; cb2 = cb2->next_cb)
00229         {
00230           if (cb1->id == cb2->id)
00231             continue;
00232           while (M_global_shift_add_merge (cb1, cb2));
00233         }                       /* for cb2 */
00234     }                           /* for cb1 */
00235   L_delete_all_danger_ext (fn);
00236 
00237   L_free_alloc_pool (L_alloc_danger_ext);
00238   L_alloc_danger_ext = NULL;
00239 }                               /* Mopti_shladd */
00240 
00241 static int
00242 M_local_shift_add_merge (L_Cb * cb)
00243 {
00244   int change = 0;
00245   L_Oper *opA, *opB, *new_oper;
00246   L_Oper *next;
00247 
00248   for (opA = cb->first_op; opA != NULL; opA = opA->next_op)
00249     {
00250       if ((opA->proc_opc != TAHOEop_SHLADD) ||
00251           !LT_is_R0_operand (opA->src[2]) || L_has_unsafe_macro_operand (opA))
00252         continue;
00253 
00254       for (opB = opA->next_op; opB; opB = next)
00255         {
00256           int macro_flag;
00257 
00258           next = opB->next_op;
00259           /* 
00260            *  Match Pattern
00261            */
00262           if (!(opB->proc_opc == TAHOEop_ADD))
00263             continue;
00264           if (!L_is_variable (opB->src[0]))
00265             continue;
00266           if (!L_is_variable (opB->src[1]))
00267             continue;
00268           if (!((L_same_operand (opA->dest[0], opB->src[0]) &&
00269                  !L_same_operand (opA->dest[0], opB->src[1])) ||
00270                 (L_same_operand (opA->dest[0], opB->src[1]) &&
00271                  !L_same_operand (opA->dest[0], opB->src[0]))))
00272             continue;
00273           if (!PG_superset_predicate_ops (opA, opB))
00274             continue;
00275           if (!L_no_defs_between (opA->dest[0], opA, opB))
00276             break;
00277           if (!L_same_def_reachs (opA->src[0], opA, opB))
00278             continue;
00279           macro_flag = (L_is_fragile_macro (opA->dest[0]) ||
00280                         L_is_fragile_macro (opA->src[0]));
00281           if (!L_no_danger
00282               (macro_flag, 0 /*load_flag */ , 0 /* store_flag */ ,
00283                opA, opB))
00284             break;
00285 
00286           /* 
00287            *  Replace Pattern
00288            */
00289 #ifdef DEBUG_SHLADD_MERGE
00290           fprintf (stderr, "Local shift-add merge: op%d -> op%d, (cb %d)\n",
00291                    opA->id, opB->id, cb->id);
00292 #endif
00293           new_oper = L_create_new_op_using (Lop_LSL, opB);
00294           new_oper->proc_opc = TAHOEop_SHLADD;
00295           if (L_same_operand (opA->dest[0], opB->src[0]))
00296             new_oper->src[2] = L_copy_operand (opB->src[1]);
00297           else
00298             new_oper->src[2] = L_copy_operand (opB->src[0]);
00299 
00300           new_oper->src[0] = L_copy_operand (opA->src[0]);
00301           new_oper->src[1] = L_copy_operand (opA->src[1]);
00302           new_oper->dest[0] = L_copy_operand (opB->dest[0]);
00303           L_insert_oper_after (cb, opB, new_oper);
00304           L_nullify_operation (opB);
00305           next = new_oper->next_op;
00306           change += 1;
00307         }                       /* for opB */
00308     }                           /* for opA */
00309   return change;
00310 }                               /* M_local_shift_add_merge */
00311 
00312 static int
00313 M_global_shift_add_merge (L_Cb * cbA, L_Cb * cbB)
00314 {
00315   int change = 0;
00316   L_Oper *opA, *opB, *new_oper;
00317   L_Oper *next;
00318 
00319   for (opA = cbA->first_op; opA != NULL; opA = opA->next_op)
00320     {
00321       for (opB = cbB->first_op; opB != NULL; opB = next)
00322         {
00323           int macro_flag, load_flag, store_flag;
00324           next = opB->next_op;
00325 
00326           /* 
00327            *  Match Pattern
00328            */
00329           if (!(opA->proc_opc == TAHOEop_SHLADD))
00330             break;
00331           if (!(LT_is_R0_operand (opA->src[2])))
00332             break;
00333           if (L_has_unsafe_macro_operand (opA))
00334             break;
00335           if (!(opB->proc_opc == TAHOEop_ADD))
00336             continue;
00337           if (!(L_is_register (opB->src[0]) || L_is_macro (opB->src[0])))
00338             continue;
00339           if (!(L_is_register (opB->src[1]) || L_is_macro (opB->src[1])))
00340             continue;
00341           if (!((L_same_operand (opA->dest[0], opB->src[0]) &&
00342                  !L_same_operand (opA->dest[0], opB->src[1])) ||
00343                 (L_same_operand (opA->dest[0], opB->src[1]) &&
00344                  !L_same_operand (opA->dest[0], opB->src[0]))))
00345             continue;
00346           if (!PG_superset_predicate_ops (opA, opB))
00347             continue;
00348 
00349           if (!L_global_no_defs_between (opA->dest[0], cbA, opA, cbB, opB))
00350             break;
00351 
00352           if (!L_global_same_def_reachs (opA->src[0], cbA, opA, cbB, opB))
00353             continue;
00354           macro_flag = (L_is_fragile_macro (opA->dest[0]) ||
00355                         L_is_fragile_macro (opA->src[0]));
00356           load_flag = 0;
00357           store_flag = 0;
00358           if (!L_global_no_danger
00359               (macro_flag, load_flag, store_flag, cbA, opA, cbB, opB))
00360             break;
00361           /* 
00362            *  Replace Pattern
00363            */
00364 #ifdef DEBUG_SHLADD_MERGE
00365           fprintf (stderr,
00366                    "Global shift-add merge: op%d (cb %d) -> op%d (cb %d)\n",
00367                    opA->id, cbA->id, opB->id, cbB->id);
00368 #endif
00369           new_oper = L_create_new_op_using (Lop_LSL, opB);
00370           new_oper->proc_opc = TAHOEop_SHLADD;
00371 
00372           if (L_same_operand (opA->dest[0], opB->src[0]))
00373             new_oper->src[2] = L_copy_operand (opB->src[1]);
00374           else
00375             new_oper->src[2] = L_copy_operand (opB->src[0]);
00376 
00377           new_oper->src[0] = L_copy_operand (opA->src[0]);
00378           new_oper->src[1] = L_copy_operand (opA->src[1]);
00379           new_oper->dest[0] = L_copy_operand (opB->dest[0]);
00380           L_insert_oper_after (cbB, opB, new_oper);
00381           L_nullify_operation (opB);
00382           next = new_oper->next_op;
00383           change += 1;
00384         }                       /* for opB */
00385     }                           /* for opA */
00386   return change;
00387 }                               /* M_global_shift_add_merge */
